name: io.github.wowcool/agentsafe
title: Agent Safe
description: 7-tool message security suite for AI agents. Protects against phishing, BEC, prompt injection, social engineering, and manipulation across email, SMS, WhatsApp, Slack, Discord, Telegram, and every messaging platform.

headers.name: skyfire-pay-id
headers.description: Your Skyfire PAY token for payment authentication. Get one at skyfire.xyz. Charged $0.02 per tool call.
